availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Hollingshead (Washington D.C. Commissioner of Deeds)

body.p: Washington, District of Columbia, notary public and justice of the peace. District of Columbia native. Married to Mary M. Hollingshead. Father of John S Hollingshead, Harry C. Hollingshead, and Am. M. Hollingshead. Notary public in the District of Columbia in 1860. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in the District of Columbia in November 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, District of Columbia, Washington, Washington D.C, Ward 3, p. 53; Find A Grave, "John S. H. Hollingshead (1814-1869)," Memorial #151066206, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=151066206 (accessed March 23, 2017).
